member.name: T:FileCabinetGenerator.FileCabinetGenerator
member.summary: Program for autogenerating new records and performing operations with them to export csv, xml format, write to fily system..

member.name: M:FileCabinetGenerator.FileCabinetGenerator.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Defines the entry point of the application.

member.name: T:FileCabinetGenerator.FileCabinetRecordGenerator
member.summary: Consists of methods to create the collection of auto generated records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetGenerator.FileCabinetRecordGenerator.GetRandomRecords(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates setted number of records (validation rules - default).
member.param: The id of the first record in the sequence.
member.returns: The list of auto generated records.
